name: Castle (itch) (Gordey)
description:
You woke up  on the territory of the mystical castle surrounded by zombies. 

To escape from the castle you have to open the gate along the way fighting with hordes of zombies.

Your only weapon is the staff of telekinesis!  
- Pull everything that comes to hand and throw it at zombies
- Create bombs to attack zombies
- Create items to open the portal

Good luck!
